member.summary: Standard Reference Method - max darkness for this style

member.summary: url to label large image

member.name: P:ZenOfBeer.BreweryDb.Pcl.Public.IBeer.FoodPairings
member.summary: A free text field containing any food pairing information for the beer

member.summary: the original gravity of the beer

member.name: P:ZenOfBeer.BreweryDb.Pcl.Public.IBeer.Abv
member.summary: the alcohol by volumn of the beer (expressed as a percentage).

member.name: P:ZenOfBeer.BreweryDb.Pcl.Public.IBeer.Ibu
member.summary: the IBU (International bittering unit) value is a measure of how bitter the beer is. The higher the number, the more bitter the beer.

member.name: P:ZenOfBeer.BreweryDb.Pcl.Public.IBeer.GlasswareId
member.summary: The id corresponding to the glass object that is assigned to this beer. If this exists, then so will the glass object. See the glass object for more information.

member.name: P:ZenOfBeer.BreweryDb.Pcl.Public.IBeer.Glass
member.summary: Contains the details about the assigned glass (id, name). the name of the glass is the type of glass in which the beer is best served.

member.name: P:ZenOfBeer.BreweryDb.Pcl.Public.IBeer.StyleId
member.summary: the id corresponding to the style object that is assigned to teh beer. See the style object for more information

member.name: P:ZenOfBeer.BreweryDb.Pcl.Public.IBeer.Style
member.summary: the style object contains details about the assigned style.

member.name: P:ZenOfBeer.BreweryDb.Pcl.Public.IBeer.IsOrganic
member.summary: whether or not the beer is certified organic

member.name: P:ZenOfBeer.BreweryDb.Pcl.Public.IBeer.Labels
member.summary: If this object is set then labels exist and it will contain items icon, medium and large that are urls to the images

member.name: P:ZenOfBeer.BreweryDb.Pcl.Public.IBeer.ServingTemperature
member.summary: the key that corresponds to the serving temperature information. See the servingTemperatureDisplay field for the full details.

member.name: P:ZenOfBeer.BreweryDb.Pcl.Public.IBeer.ServingTemperatureDisplay
member.summary: the serving temperature information. If the servingTemperature was "cool" then this field would be like "Cool - (8-12c/45-54F)"

member.name: P:ZenOfBeer.BreweryDb.Pcl.Public.IBeer.Status
member.summary: the status key for the object

member.name: P:ZenOfBeer.BreweryDb.Pcl.Public.IBeer.StatusDisplay
member.summary: The display string corresponding to the status

member.name: P:ZenOfBeer.BreweryDb.Pcl.Public.IBeer.AvailableId
member.summary: the id corresponding to the assigned availability object

member.name: P:ZenOfBeer.BreweryDb.Pcl.Public.IBeer.Available
member.summary: the object that provides details for the assigned availability. It contains id, name and description

member.name: P:ZenOfBeer.BreweryDb.Pcl.Public.IBeer.BeerVariationId
member.summary: if this beer is a variation of another beer, then the id will be set to the id of the source beer.

member.name: P:ZenOfBeer.BreweryDb.Pcl.Public.IBeer.BeerVariation
member.summary: the beer to which the variationId is pointing

member.summary: The year field is for vintages of a beer

member.summary:
Gets a list of all adjuncts. Results are paginated.
possible query parameters: p : Page Number adjunctId : get a singe adjunct by Id

member.summary: This value will always be set to "misc"
